text: Rabin Koirala is a Nepalese politician, belonging to the CPN (UML). He is a former Member of Parliament, elected in 2013,NepaliHeadlines.com - "ML's Koirala Elected from Jhapa", 22 Nov (2013)Nepali Times, 5 Dec 2013, p 16: "Going Local" - incl. Jhapa-1The Kathmandu Post: "Heavyweight candidates in all constituencies of Jhapa", 16 Oct 2017 and a former Mayor of Mechinagar.Nepal: "MECHINAGAR MUNICIPALITY: Resource Drain", 24 Aug 2010 == References == Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Members of the 2nd Nepalese Constituent Assembly Category:Communist Party of Nepal (Unified Marxistâ€“Leninist) politicians Category:Nepalese mayors
title: Rabin Koirala
